template.template: SAF Basic Integra-W template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0
template.name: SAF Basic Integra-W template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0
template.description: Contacts: saftehnika.com, techsupport@saftehnika.com. Basic template for SAF radio Integra-W

trigger.expression: max(/SAF Basic Integra-W template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/icmpping,#3)=0
trigger.name: Unavailable by ICMP ping
trigger.description: Last three attempts returned timeout. Please check device connectivity.

trigger.expression: min(/SAF Basic Integra-W template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/icmppingloss,5m)>{$ICMP_LOSS_WARN} and min(/SAF Basic Integra-W template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/icmppingloss,5m)<100
trigger.name: High ICMP ping loss

dependency.name: Unavailable by ICMP ping
dependency.expression: max(/SAF Basic Integra-W template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/icmpping,#3)=0

trigger.expression: avg(/SAF Basic Integra-W template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/icmppingsec,5m)>{$ICMP_RESPONSE_TIME_WARN}
trigger.name: High ICMP ping response time

dependency.name: High ICMP ping loss
dependency.expression: min(/SAF Basic Integra-W template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/icmppingloss,5m)>{$ICMP_LOSS_WARN} and min(/SAF Basic Integra-W template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/icmppingloss,5m)<100

dependency.name: Unavailable by ICMP ping
dependency.expression: max(/SAF Basic Integra-W template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/icmpping,#3)=0

trigger.expression: (last(/SAF Basic Integra-W template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraWifPortAdminStatus_LAN,#1)<>last(/SAF Basic Integra-W template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraWifPortAdminStatus_LAN,#2))=1
trigger.name: LAN port administrative status changed

trigger.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-W template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraWifPortAdminStatus_LAN)=2
trigger.name: LAN port disable

trigger.expression: (last(/SAF Basic Integra-W template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraWifPortAdminStatus_LAN3,#1)<>last(/SAF Basic Integra-W template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraWifPortAdminStatus_LAN3,#2))=1
trigger.name: LAN3 port administrative status changed

trigger.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-W template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraWifPortAdminStatus_LAN3)=2
trigger.name: LAN3 port disabled

trigger.expression: (last(/SAF Basic Integra-W template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraWifPortAdminStatus_MNG,#1)<>last(/SAF Basic Integra-W template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraWifPortAdminStatus_MNG,#2))=1
trigger.name: MNG port administrative status changed

trigger.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-W template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraWifPortAdminStatus_MNG)=2
trigger.name: MNG port disabled

trigger.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-W template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraWifPortOperStatus_LAN)=2
trigger.name: LAN port DOWN

dependency.name: LAN port disable
dependency.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-W template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraWifPortAdminStatus_LAN)=2

trigger.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-W template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraWifPortOperStatus_LAN3)=2
trigger.name: LAN3 port DOWN

dependency.name: LAN3 port disabled
dependency.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-W template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraWifPortAdminStatus_LAN3)=2

trigger.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-W template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraWifPortOperStatus_MNG)=2
trigger.name: MNG port DOWN

dependency.name: MNG port disabled
dependency.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-W template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraWifPortAdminStatus_MNG)=2

trigger.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-W template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraWradioTxMute)=1 or last(/SAF Basic Integra-W template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraWradioTxMute)=3
trigger.recovery_expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-W template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/integraWradioTxMute)=2
trigger.name: Tx muted

item.name: Data Acquire status
item.description: This is the current status of modem data acquire when queried modem status.

valuemap.name: SAF INTEGRA G Modem acquire staus

trigger.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-W template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWmodemAcquireStatus)=3
trigger.recovery_expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-W template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWmodemAcquireStatus)=2
trigger.name: Modem Acquire Status Failed

trigger.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-W template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWmodemAcquireStatus)=1
trigger.name: Modem Acquire Status in Progress

item.name: FEC load
item.description: Decoder stress or FEC load value

trigger.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-W template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWmodemFECload)>=80
trigger.name: FEC load high

trigger.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-W template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWmodemRadialMse)<={$SIGQUAL}
trigger.name: Signal quality low alarm

item.name: Modem capacity Rx
item.description: Rx ethernet capacity in kilobits per second

item.name: Modem capacity Tx
item.description: Tx ethernet capacity in kilobits per second

trigger.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-W template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWradioPLL)=1
trigger.recovery_expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-W template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWradioPLL)=2
trigger.name: PLL status ERROR

trigger.expression: between(last(/SAF Basic Integra-W template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWradioRxLevel),{$RXLEVMIN},{$RXLEVMAX})=0
trigger.name: Rx level out of range

valuemap.name: SAF INTEGRA G Rx level state

trigger.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-W template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWradioRxLevelState)=2 or last(/SAF Basic Integra-W template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWradioRxLevelState)=3 or last(/SAF Basic Integra-W template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWradioRxLevelState)=4
trigger.recovery_expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-W template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWradioRxLevelState)=1
trigger.name: Rx level status alarm

trigger.expression: between(last(/SAF Basic Integra-W template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWradioTemperature),{$TEMPMIN},{$TEMPMAX80})=0
trigger.name: Radio temperature out of range!

trigger.expression: between(last(/SAF Basic Integra-W template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWsysBoardTemperature),{$TEMPMIN},{$TEMPMAX100})=0
trigger.name: System temperature out of range

trigger.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-W template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWsysCPUload)>95
trigger.name: CPU load high

trigger.expression: between(last(/SAF Basic Integra-W template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWsysCPUtemperature),{$TEMPMIN},{$TEMPMAX100})=0
trigger.name: System CPU temperature out of range

trigger.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-W template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWsysLicenseGenStatus)=4
trigger.name: License unlimited

trigger.expression: between(last(/SAF Basic Integra-W template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWsysPSUcurrent),{$PSUCURRMIN},{$PSUCURRMAX})=0
trigger.name: PSU current alarm

trigger.expression: between(last(/SAF Basic Integra-W template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWsysPSUpower),{$PSUPOWMIN},{$PSUPOWMAX})=0
trigger.name: PSU power alarm

valuemap.name: SAF INTEGRA G Modem acquire staus
SAF INTEGRA G Rx level state

trigger.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-W template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWsysLicenseExpire)<=1209600 or last(/SAF Basic Integra-W template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWsysLicenseGenStatus)=2
trigger.recovery_expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-W template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWsysLicenseExpire)>1209600 or last(/SAF Basic Integra-W template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWsysLicenseGenStatus)=1
trigger.name: License will expire or expired

dependency.name: License unlimited
dependency.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-W template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWsysLicenseGenStatus)=4

trigger.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-W template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWmodemRxModulation)<>last(/SAF Basic Integra-W template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWmodemModulation) or last(/SAF Basic Integra-W template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWmodemTxModulation)<>last(/SAF Basic Integra-W template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWmodemModulation)
trigger.recovery_expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-W template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWmodemRxModulation)=last(/SAF Basic Integra-W template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWmodemModulation) and last(/SAF Basic Integra-W template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWmodemTxModulation)=last(/SAF Basic Integra-W template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0/SAF-INTEGRAW-MIB_integraWmodemModulation)
trigger.name: Link modulation drop

item.host: SAF Basic Integra-W template V1.1 for Zabbix 6.0
